Criminals](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/police-corruption-and-brutality-come-under-the-microscope-in-new-book-when-cops-are-criminals/view/)Veronica Gorrie chose a career in policing because she wanted to serve and protect. She found many of her colleagues had a different agenda. - [Weekly news quiz: Which state won the Olympics, Latrell Mitchell's bad day, and the end of another Australian festival](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/weekly-news-quiz-which-state-won-the-olympics-latrell-mitchells-bad-day-and-the-end-of-another-australian-festival/view/)It's time to test your knowledge about the news of the week. - [Fracturing a finger putting in a tampon: Should period care be covered by the NDIS?](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/fracturing-a-finger-putting-in-a-tampon-should-period-care-be-covered-by-the-ndis/view/)Women with disabilities are worried they could lose access to essential period care as the NDIS transitions to new rules. - [Weapons export rules removed for trade between Australia and AUKUS partners](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/weapons-export-rules-removed-for-trade-between-australia-and-aukus-partners/view/)The US will remove critical export and arms regulations in order to encourage trade of weapons and military technology between the three AUKUS partners. - [Breaker Raygun calls for end to 'pretty devastating' Olympics reaction](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/breaker-raygun-calls-for-end-to-pretty-devastating-olympics-reaction/view/)Australian Olympic breakdancer Rachael Gunn has asked for the "hate" towards her family and friends to stop in the aftermath of a media furore over her performance in Paris. - [Penrith sweating on Cleary fitness after star halfback leaves field in Panthers' 24-22 loss to Melbourne](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/penrith-sweating-on-cleary-fitness-after-star-halfback-leaves-field-in-panthers-24-22-loss-to-melbourne/view/)Penrith's push for a fourth consecutive NRL premiership has been rocked after star halfback Nathan Cleary injured his left shoulder in the 24-22 loss to fellow heavyweights Melbourne. - [Live: Storm come out firing to take early 10-point lead over Panthers in heavyweight clash](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/live-storm-come-out-firing-to-take-early-10-point-lead-over-panthers-in-heavyweight-clash/view/)Ladder leaders Melbourne head to Penrith to face the three-time defending premiers in a top of the table clash that could decide this year's minor premiership. Follow live. - [Live: Penrith sweating on Cleary fitness after star halfback leaves field in Panthers' 24-22 loss to Melbourne](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/live-penrith-sweating-on-cleary-fitness-after-star-halfback-leaves-field-in-panthers-24-22-loss-to-melbourne/view/)The Melbourne Storm are on the verge of winning the minor premiership after beating the Penrith Panthers in a thriller. Follow live. - [Live: Panthers come roaring back after Storm jump out to early lead](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/live-panthers-come-roaring-back-after-storm-jump-out-to-early-lead/view/)Ladder leaders Melbourne head to Penrith to face the three-time defending premiers in a top of the table clash that could decide this year's minor premiership. Follow live. - [Live: Panthers boosted as big names return for heavyweight clash with Storm](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/live-panthers-boosted-as-big-names-return-for-heavyweight-clash-with-storm/view/)Ladder leaders Melbourne head to Penrith to face the three-time defending premiers in a top of the table clash that could decide this year's minor premiership. Follow live. - [Live: Panthers and Storm meet in top of the table clash to begin round 24](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/live-panthers-and-storm-meet-in-top-of-the-table-clash-to-begin-round-24/view/)First and second on the NRL ladder meet in a heavyweight clash that could decide this year's minor premiership. Follow live. - [Live: Melbourne take narrow lead into second half of blockbuster clash against Penrith](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/live-melbourne-take-narrow-lead-into-second-half-of-blockbuster-clash-against-penrith/view/)Ladder leaders Melbourne head to Penrith to face the three-time defending premiers in a top of the table clash that could decide this year's minor premiership. Follow live. - [Live: Cameron Munster flattened by Storm teammate who is sin-binned for swinging high tackle, as Penrith and Melbourne go down to the wire](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/live-cameron-munster-flattened-by-storm-teammate-who-is-sin-binned-for-swinging-high-tackle-as-penrith-and-melbourne-go-down-to-the-wire/view/)Melbourne star Cameron Munster has been flattened by a swinging arm from his teammate Nelson Asofa-Solomona, who was sent to the sin bin for also hitting a Panther in the back of the head. Follow live. - [Karyn Murphy and Tahnee Norris among six women inducted into NRL Hall of Fame in historic rugby league moment](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/karyn-murphy-and-tahnee-norris-among-six-women-inducted-into-nrl-hall-of-fame-in-historic-rugby-league-moment/view/)The NRL recognises the finest female players of the pre semi-professional era, elevating its first six women into the Hall of Fame in a historic moment for rugby league. - [As Dutton joined the heckles, a moment of kindness stopped business in usual in Parliament](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/as-dutton-joined-the-heckles-a-moment-of-kindness-stopped-business-in-usual-in-parliament/view/)The OG teal independent has always had an ability to get under the skin of the blokes in the Coalition, but today seemed different, with Steggall at times having to shout to get over the wall of words. - [As Dutton joined the heckles, a moment of kindness stopped business as usual in Parliament](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/as-dutton-joined-the-heckles-a-moment-of-kindness-stopped-business-as-usual-in-parliament/view/)The OG teal independent has always had an ability to get under the skin of the blokes in the Coalition, but today seemed different, with Steggall at times having to shout to get over the wall of words. - [Latrell Mitchell handed breach notice by NRL over photograph featuring white substance](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/latrell-mitchell-handed-breach-notice-by-nrl-over-photograph-featuring-white-substance/view/)Rabbitohs star Latrell Mitchell will have five business days to respond to a breach notice from the NRL following the integrity unit's investigation into a photograph of him which circulated on social media this week. - ['Stirring up public hatred without factual basis': AOC condemns petition attacking Olympic competitor 'Raygun'](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/stirring-up-public-hatred-without-factual-basis-aoc-condemns-petition-attacking-olympic-competitor-raygun/view/)The AOC condemns an online petition attacking breaking competitor Rachael "Raygun" Gunn after her much commented-on performance in Paris, saying it contains "numerous falsehoods designed to engender hatred". - [Perplexing, punishing power prices force industry to concede 'smart' meter overhaul not so clever](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/perplexing-punishing-power-prices-force-industry-to-concede-smart-meter-overhaul-not-so-clever/view/)Like millions of Australians, Doreen Fawcett is grappling with a nightmare of unwanted power bill complexity. Calls for simplification are growing. - [Every day, Doreen has a decision to make: Keep her sick husband warm or risk another crippling power bill](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/every-day-doreen-has-a-decision-to-make-keep-her-sick-husband-warm-or-risk-another-crippling-power-bill/view/)Like millions of Australians, Doreen Fawcett is grappling with a nightmare of unwanted power bill complexity. Calls for simplification are growing. - [Federal government guarantees regional flights for Rex customers during administration](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/federal-government-guarantees-regional-flights-for-rex-customers-during-administration/view/)The federal government will guarantee all regional flight bookings for customers of Rex during its administration process over the next month. - [What Leigh Sales learned about interviewing from autistic student journalists where no topic is off-limits](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/what-leigh-sales-learned-about-interviewing-from-autistic-student-journalists-where-no-topic-is-off-limits/view/)In the new TV role, the Australian Story host mentors a cohort of autistic journalism students before they grill high-profile celebrities. But the learning wasn't one-way — this is what she learned about interviewing and the tips and questions she's banked for future interviews. - [Collingwood coach Craig McRae disappointed after 'selfish' home ground bias claim on AFL umpires](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/collingwood-coach-craig-mcrae-disappointed-after-selfish-home-ground-bias-claim-on-afl-umpires/view/)Just days after causing a major stir with his post-match comments on the AFL's umpires, Collingwood coach Craig McRae has changed his tune. - [Unemployment rate climbs to 4.2 per cent in July with more than 62,000 jobs created](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/unemployment-rate-climbs-to-42-per-cent-in-july-with-more-than-62000-jobs-created/view/)The unemployment rate has climbed to 4.2 per cent in July, with data from the Australian Bureau of Statistics showing more than 62,000 jobs were created last month. - [Unemployment rate climbs to 4.2 per cent in July with more than 58,000 jobs created](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/unemployment-rate-climbs-to-42-per-cent-in-july-with-more-than-58000-jobs-created/view/)The unemployment rate has climbed to 4.2 per cent in July, with data from the Australian Bureau of Statistics showing more than 58,000 jobs were created last month. - [Why has the WHO declared mpox a global health emergency? Here's what we know so far](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/why-has-the-who-declared-mpox-a-global-health-emergency-heres-what-we-know-so-far/view/)The latest outbreak of mpox is different to the one that spread around the world in 2022 — and has experts on high alert. - [Mpox is officially a global health emergency. So what's next?](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/mpox-is-officially-a-global-health-emergency-so-whats-next/view/)The latest outbreak of mpox is different to the one that spread around the world in 2022 — and has experts on high alert - [Dutton doubles down on Gaza refugee ban amid accusations of stoking division](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/dutton-doubles-down-on-gaza-refugee-ban-amid-accusations-of-stoking-division/view/)Peter Dutton's call for a temporary ban on accepting Palestinian refugees from Gaza has fuelled government accusations he is dividing the community. - [Live: Teal Zali Steggall tells Peter Dutton to 'stop being racist' in heated exchange](https://www.newslocker.com/en-au/news/general-news/live-teal-zali-steggall-tells-peter-dutton-to-stop-being-racist-in-heated-exchange/view/)A teal independent told Peter Dutton to "stop being racist" as the opposition leader stands by a demand for a temporary ban on Gazan arrivals. Follow live. Follow [@ausgeneralnews](https://twitter.com/ausgeneralnews) on Twitter!
